snippet.title: Captain Kaon - Early Access Trailer
snippet.description:
Captain Kaon is available now on Steam Early Access.

A salute to such 1980s classics as Thrust and Gravitar, Captain Kaon brings the vector graphics of old right ‘up-to-date’ with vibrant Amiga-style pixel art and a tight twin-stick control mechanic. 

Checkout it out on Steam here: http://store.steampowered.com/app/527380/
